name: Jewel Block Puzzle Classic
description:
Come to Jewel Block Puzzle Classic, your task is filling the blocks in vertical or horizontal and when they disappear, you will get the points. The more rows are destroyed, the higher the score you get. The goal of this game is the highest score you get at the end of the game.

You will lose if there is no space on the board to fill the next blocks. Focusing, viewing and arranging the blocks logically.

The game is totally free, unlimited time, you can entertain in the colorful world and the lively sound of Jewel Block Puzzle Classic whenever you want.

Jewel Block Puzzle Classic - An attractive puzzle game, which shows off your great thinking and puzzle skills. Download today and conquer the challenges with your friends. Wish you have fun while playing game!
